metadata.title: CVE-2021-20280 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Text-based feedback answers required additional sanitizing to preventstored XSS and blind SSRF risks in moodle before 3.10.2, 3.9.5, 3.8.8,3.5.17.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
